title: ASP.NET Misconfiguration: Not Using Input Validation Framework
overview: The ASP.NET application does not use an input validation framework.
remediation: ::PHASE:Architecture and Design:STRATEGY::EFFECTIVENESS::DESCRIPTION:Use the ASP.NET validation framework to check all program input before it is processed by the application. Example uses of the validation framework include checking to ensure that: Phone number fields contain only valid characters in phone numbers Boolean values are only T or F Free-form strings are of a reasonable length and composition::
